attributes.action: increase the resources to the armed forces to reduce loss of life and fully enable them, whilst they are put in harms way
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst we may or may not agree with the reasons for our armed forces being deployed to Afghanistan, Iraq or any other conflict area. 

We request and require that the government provide all resources that are required to reduce loss of life and enable our armed forces to do their job 100% without ever feeling they are lacking support or equipment.

To have another armed forces death due to lack of equipment is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
